name: Mechanical Keyboard Designer
description:
Mechanical keyboard using auto-layout and components. Try changing the shape/style/color of one of the main components and see how it affects the full keyboard/keyset. Or base other keyboard layouts or keycap styles off of this one.


Updates


Dec 1, 2020

  • Fix row numbers on KATE TKL keyset

Oct 16, 2020

  • Rename "master" to "main" ✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽✊🏼✊🏻✊
  • Add row numbers for Drop ALT keyboard and RAMA KATE TKL keyset

Oct 3, 2020

  • Added components for the upcoming RAMA WORKS KATE keyset in addition to a TKL layout.

Sept 9, 2020

  • Updated the main key to include the empty space around the key and adjusted all keys to follow Cherry MX mechanical keyboard style key cap sizing (e.g. 1u, 2.75u, 7u, etc...). This allows for exact sizing of keys based on 1u = 64pt.
